title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Use the salty 747 mod as cockpit in the C-17 Globemaster
description:
In this how to I will show you how you can use the Salty 747 mod in combination with the C-17 Globemaster airplane. By default this airplane will only work with the default 747 cockpit but using these steps you can continue to use the Salty 747 cockpit which adds a lot of functionality.

If you like to use the mod and the aircraft also please use the links below to download them:

C-17 Globemaster
https://nl.flightsim.to/file/10204/c-17-globemaster-working-cockpit-wip

Salty 747 cockpit
https://github.com/saltysimulations/salty-747
